title: New: Girls Names – A Troubled See
body:
What’s your favourite **Girls Name**? Mine is probably Isabella or maybe Claire (via **Grimes**).

Anyway, how’s about this for a slice of wonderfully upbeat indie-pop, eh? One half of the 7″ split with label mates **Weird Dreams**, _A Troubled See_ will get it’s release on 25 June via **Tough Love Records** / **Slumberland Records**. So, sit back, wash the week away with a few drinks, and vibe out with Girls Names.

NB: The picture has no relevance whatsoever.
